website_summaries.verdict: A nice clear mat that protects but doesn't detract from the beauty of your hardwood floor.
pros: Made of clear plastic material that feels durable and allows chairs to move over it freely
Can be used on various flooring surfaces
cons: Has a plastic odor that's strong at first, but tends to fade
Comes in a roll, and may take a few days to stay flat once in place

customer_reviews.title: Rolled the wrong way, sticks up
customer_reviews.text: Who thought that it was a good idea to roll this mat before packaging the wrong way? And who was the person responsible for approving such idea? The mat came rolled the opposite way and no matter what you do it will always stay curved. The instructions say it will straighten out naturally after a few hours. Try days and still nothing. There are also huge dents from my chair within a couple of hours that do not seem to go away which questions the long term durability of this item. I might return it and pay more money for one that hopefully is rolled the right way so that when I open it the curve faces down
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Thick and non slippery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office. I have wooden floor in my office room and the office chair used to slip a lot. With this mat, now my chair doesn’t slip. The mat has strong grip on the floor. Its heavy and thick enough to hold itself and not slide with chair weight, and not obstruct while walking. The top design enables the friction for the chair wheels. Its very clear and soft plastic with no smell at all. Quality is no doubt the biggest plus point of this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Great mats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for my office. We just put down new laminate flooring and I wanted to protect the finish of the floor from the computer chairs on wheels that we have. They are the perfect size. I followed what a couple of other reviewers said and rolled them the other way once I got them out of the box and they laid flat just about right away. They had a slight smell to them, but we are in a 1000 square foot open office, so the smell dissipated pretty quickly. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey HochstetterTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not Odorless! Very Strong Plasticky Smell...
customer_reviews.text: The mat isn’t very thick but I believe it is thick enough to protect my hardwood floor from my office chair. However, the mat has a very strong plasticky smell. The description clearly stated that it is supposed to be odorless. It has been two full days since I unrolled the mat, and the smell is still very strong. If it doesn’t dissipate within the next few days, I may have to return it because I think I’m getting a headache from it...
customer_reviews.author: L. Mak

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was neither durable nor sturdy. My husband removed the floor mat from the box, put it in place, sat in the chair for a few seconds to see if it moved easily (it did not), but was really amazed that those few seconds left such indelible marks in the mat. I strongly suggest you choose a different product.
customer_reviews.author: cpmama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't allow for smooth rolling
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is so thin that the chair feet compress it and create deep valleys. This does not allow for easy maneuverability. In fact, it's harder to roll than it was on the carpet. The only benefit I see is that it protects the carpet under my chair, though that was not what I bought it for. Pass on this one and invest in a thicker mat!
customer_reviews.author: L. E.

customer_reviews.title: Good size for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is a decent size for the price. A little thinner than some mats, but as long as it keeps the chair from the floor, that's not really a big deal. Unrolled fairly easily - just used a heavy box to weight it down for a couple of days. The only negative is the fairly strong plastic smell - A few days unrolled in the garage weren't enough to get rid of the smell completely. Hopefully the skunk plastic smell will dissipate soon, as the need to work from home doesn't mean I want to wreck my floors with an office chair...
customer_reviews.author: Not the droid you're looking for

customer_reviews.title: Great mat - exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband’s office. He has a heavy leather chair and it doesn’t roll well on the carpet. We also have a computer space on the hardwood that I could use it on. We looked at some chair mats a local office store but ended up buying this one off Amazon. The price and convenience of having it delivered to our door in one day was ideal. It is light weight and was well packaged. It was rolled up but unfolded well and quickly laid flat. The mat has a lip to fit under the desk and stays in place well. This is exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lobdin

customer_reviews.title: If you like the way a skunk smells, buy this mat!
customer_reviews.text: I usually read reviews on Amazon but skipped them when ordering this. What could go wrong? Its a mat for my floor. Well the answer is that the smell of this thing (as reported by other reviewers) is overwhelming. It has impregnated my workshop with an aroma that makes Pepe Le Pew smell like Chanel #5. I have placed it outside on the patio for a day to see if it disapates, but I'm not optimistic since my workshop has not cleared out after 12 hours. Do not buy unless you have no sense of smell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Colacino

customer_reviews.title: Flikys, thin and smells for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. It's very flimsy and the chair just sinks into it. Almost makes me feel like it's pointless to have this. Theres no spikey things on the bottom and its very thin. I weigh 125lbs and my chair sinks through this and "bites" into it. I do have it on carpet. If you're on a budget and simply looking for a plastic layering to protect your floor, then this is great. However, if you're looking for an item to be able to roll your chair on or a mat that's heavy enough and doesnt constantly move, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: JennBerry

customer_reviews.title: It's not design for carpeted floors!
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I'm WFH now and my home office is carpeted so my chair did not slide smoothly across it, so I decided to purchase this mat! This mat does not stay in its place and my chair doesn't moves any better with it. And when it does move, it mat moves with it! And the wheels of my chair leaves dents in the mat and I'm not a heavy person so it's not like I'm causing the chair to press into the mat with my body weight! This was a waste of money. It may work better on hard surface but it's terrible on carpet!
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlT

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell even without removing from box
customer_reviews.text: Gave 1 star, for what I don't know. Opened box flap, put my nose to it. Strong chemical smell! Did not even remove it from its box. I have anxiety disorder & smell will make it worse. Cannot wait for odor to dissipate, if it does at all. Returned. Kudos to Amazon for issuing prompt refund in less than 3 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: This is not a cheap plastic mat- it's odorless and lays flat
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these types of mats and had to return two. Then I ordered this one. It's rolled up but does not have that chemical smell that most have. It took less than a day to flatten out - my other returned ones took days and now that this one is flat and odorless - it's a keeper. the size is small, so check your measurements, but this fits the job i wanted it for and isn't a cheap plastic mat either. It seems durable but I've only used it a week but it is definitely sturdy and hopefully long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: small area
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and after a day of airing out in a different room, the plastic odor was completely gone. I think this mat would be perfect for an adult who rolls around minimally. I ordered this for my thirteen year old daughter's desk that is underneath the bunk. For her, I think it is a little small. It won't cover the whole desk area as she does homework or arts and crafts. I should have measured before ordering. Despite all this, I plan to give it a try and keep the mat. She seems to like it, and like I said, it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: SummerGirl

customer_reviews.title: A must have to protect hard floors from office chair scuffs
customer_reviews.text: I love this clear mat. It is perfectly sized to fit in a small footprint but be more than enough coverage for an office chair. It is almost invisible on my wooden floor and so slim that walking over it is a non- Issue. I have mine overlapping a high traffic area of my bedroom but no one has tripped over it. The chair easily rolls over the smoothly textured surface. It protects the floor from scuffs but doesn’t intrude in the looks of the area it covers.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyx3Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but ok
customer_reviews.text: The smell was so bad and skunk-like that I called the gas company to report a leak and they shut our gas off for a day to investigate. I felt like an idiot when I realized what was stinking out our house. Other than that, it’s a decent chair mat and 1.5 weeks later the smell has finally dissipated.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morgan

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my office due to having carpet and wanted something wear my chair wouldnt get stuck. I came across this item and it seemed like it was a great option. It unrolled easily and became flat quickly as long as you followed the directions it provided. It does tend to move around a little more than I anticipated but its okay, I don't mind that as long as my chair doesnt get stuck on the carpet. My coworker now wants to get one for his office as well.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa monique

customer_reviews.title: Too thin for tile
customer_reviews.text: Some folks have indicated a smell and while true it disappeared quickly for us. I think that this might work a lot better on a wood floor then the tile floor we have. Due to the thickness it did little to smooth out the floor and the chair continued to rattle and clank, something we were trying to avoid. (FYI, do not even think of using this on anything other that a hard surface, hopefully, with little to no imperfections.)
customer_reviews.author: Rc Esq.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. Only wish is was bigger as I continually find myself rolling off the back edge and onto the wood floor I’m trying to protect. Obviously that’s no fault of the protect it’s the size as described but I just can’t see how anyone could keep themselves on mats like this they barely have enough surface area for the chair at a stand still. Oh well it’s a nice mat exactly as described and so far is protecting my floor as long as I remember to stay on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Z.

customer_reviews.title: A good mat but it does smell unpleasant for the first week or so.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is thin enough that you can roll your chair on and off it with no problem. Some reviewers said their mats wouldn't lie flat. Perhaps because I had it delivered on a hot summer day, my mat lay perfectly flat immediately. The mat seems of decent quality but only time will tell how it holds up. I took away a star in the rating because of the smell. My mat was installed 10 days ago and it has lost most, but by no means all, of the skunk-like odor it emitted. It was quite strong for the first few days and I have no idea if that off-gassing was toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G.

customer_reviews.title: Slides around and has an odor
customer_reviews.text: It’s a heavy duty mat but still has a faint smell of that of a skunk, even after 2 weeks. It slides around under the desk chair. I have hardwood floors and the mat moves around along with the chair. I wouldn’t order this again,
customer_reviews.author: atagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I was leery about ordering this floor mat. However I’m glad I did. It’s perfect. Arrived rolled up in a tube and I worried about it lying flat but I have no issues. My home office chair moves more easily. It’s thin, not like the one in my work office that is thick and catches my stilletos heel. This one is flexible whereas others are hard plastic that eventually cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Debra K Busby

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough and it doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: Buy a bigger one if you have a rolling chair and expect it to move quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Abdelrahman

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and smelly
customer_reviews.text: First thing i notice off the bat is that this thing is quite thin. Thats not to much of a problem for me, then the smell hit! I didnt order a plastic factory, but this item came with a free one! The smell filled my apartment and it still lingers to this day. This is not the only major problem this item has though! The bottom of the mat is completly smooth! This may not be a problem if its on hard flooring, but for carpet it seems to be all over the place. Combo this with the thinness of the product and it sticks better to the bottom of my chair then it does the floor. Wouldnt recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.text: It’s actually perfect for my hardwood floors with my new office chair. Knocked down 1 star because the smell from the plastic is strong. I left it out all day in balcony to air out. Much better after that. Goes away after 3 days. Hint: once you get it, unroll it the opposite way for 30 seconds and it will be perfect flat. Overall great!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Prime Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair mat
customer_reviews.text: After unpackaging this and letting it sit for a few days to unroll it has been working really well - protecting the floor underneath. I needed to add little rubber stoppers in the corner to keep it from sliding on the hardwood floors but besides that it was a great price, easy "installation" and after a month is working really well.
customer_reviews.author: rodrigst

customer_reviews.title: Thinner that I thought
customer_reviews.text: I had read of some people using this over carpet with good luck. NOPE! Way to thin for that... and it's not advertised for that, so I'm not dinging them. For the price it was worth a shot. Using it in a bedroom now, over hardwoods... works fine, and shows no wear after a month with about 60% usage averaging 3-5 hours per use.
customer_reviews.author: Saltydog

customer_reviews.title: NOT Odorless, POTENTIALLY DANGEROUS!
customer_reviews.text: As far as functionality goes, I have no complaints. The size is right and it seems fairly durable. Can update this later if anything changes. What concerns me the most about this mat is the smell. When unboxing the mat, you get an immediate smell of something similar to a skunk, pot or burnt rubber. This is quite possibly due to chinese manufacturing using a rubberizing product like recycled tires in the plastic. This can emit some fairly harmful chemicals which you can google and find out more about. Suffice to say, I'm washing this down with some dawn dish soap before I continue using it, which from what I've read, should help with the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G

customer_reviews.title: What's that smell?
customer_reviews.text: As a mat to protect my floor, it's doing great. It was easy to unroll, and I feel like it's doing a fine job at that. However, it absolutely stinks! I was hoping it would stink like plastic, but it smells more like a skunk. Considering this is set up in a main area of my house (making it work during quarantine), it's obvious to everyone. If you just come near this floor, it smells like skunk. It's almost unbearable to use it, if I'm honest. I wouldn't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great desk mat
customer_reviews.text: I only have the mat in use for one week now so can't answer how durable it will be but so far, so good. It unrolled nicely. I laid it flat on floor and put the desk chair in the middle and a couple of heavy products on the corners and left it that way for 2 days. I did notice a slight smell on the second day when I passed the room but that disappeared after a day.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Albanese

customer_reviews.title: Has no prongs - slides around. Also, still curled a week after unraveling from package.
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I was tempted by the cheap chair mat that seemed to have good reviews. I am a little disappointed, however, that there are no pegs to stop this from sliding. Sometimes this will slide with your chair. Others, you will slip getting out of your chair. Also, it is still curled around all of the edges from being tightly rolled in its package. It creates a tacky aesthetic and should be used in places it won't be seen much. Overall, it's an affordable option and does feel like it's made from a quality material. I am tempted to return it and spend the extra money for something that feels more secure.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is for Hardwood and Ceramic floor, it is not for carpet people! so please let me repeat that again, it is not for carpet! Important to mention too, is to follow the unboxing directions there it explains the way to roll it out. Now moving on with my rating, the only down side for me is that it moves too much in the hardwood floor, in fact is the chair isn't in it, and someone step on it, it can even slipp and you might fall. that is reason for not 5 star rating, other than that. It Works!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I didn't read the product description thoroughly enough, as I found that it really wasn't "solid," in that the wheels of my desk chair "sunk into" the mat and made it somewhat difficult to maneuver and roll my chair to a different position. Also, it "moves around" a bit and doesn't stay put or "bite" into my carpet. I wouldn't purchase this again but would buy a more solid chair mat designed specifically for carpets. My fault.
customer_reviews.author: LHG

customer_reviews.title: Lies Flat and Blends Seemlessly
customer_reviews.text: This is far better than any other office mat I've had so far. The sides do not curl or catch onto the wheel of my chair. Lies completely flat even after moving it around to mop underneath. Sticks to the floor and doesn't move much. It might slightly tilt after a week of use, but it's easily adjustable. Easy to roll out and doesn't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs to air out for awhile before use indoors.
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat. It is thick enough to do a good job but has a terrible odor. I had to move it to the garage to air out. I'm going to leave it there for a week before I bring it inside again. I can't rate the durability because I just bought it and don't know if it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works.
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice the odor some people have complained about even when first opening the box. Laid it out in the sun a few hours and it flattened out fine. Put in place and chair rolls easily on it. Only question, what is the little bean bag that comes inside the roll for?
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great chair mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to prevent my hardwood floor getting anymore scratches. Some people said on the review that it has strong smell, but mine didn’t smell at all. And it was rolled in the shipping box, so I rolled it on the opposite side, and it laid flat pretty quickly. I have been using it for a week now, it never slides, and does a very good job protecting my floor. I am very happy having it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Z.

customer_reviews.title: Chair will Sink In
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put over carpet. Unfortunately this isn’t sturdy whatsoever and causes my chair to sink into the plastic. The plastic is soft and will glide over any surface. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Prem

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: This protects the wood floor like it is supposed to. It does tend to slide around over time. Working from home, I'm at the computer desk quite a bit and once a week (or so) I simply re-adjust it. Other than that I would give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Auxier

customer_reviews.title: Smooth rolling and sturdy built
customer_reviews.text: Chair mat is a standard size and quite sturdy and smooth. My need was the chair upstairs was making a lot of sound while rolling ,after I put this mat the sound has gone .My room is directly under that room ,so I am very happy that those scratchy sounds of wheels are gone.Of course it’s good for the hardwood floor too.
customer_reviews.author: M.A

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is terrible, our house smelled like a skunk the minute this was unpacked. It is outside on a covered porch hoping the smell comes out or this is completely unusable. Wish I would have chosen another product. Not happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Great chair mat...but moves a lot on vinyl floor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new home office to protect the floor. It lies flat, was the right price and does the job. The only thing I don't like is that it moves around a bit on the floor. I'd give it a 4.5 out of 5 officially but I can't give a half star
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Jo

customer_reviews.title: blue tint, won't fully uncurl and still stinks like plastic
customer_reviews.text: After leaving it outside for a few days it still stinks up my office within 20 minutes. It's... I guess it's fine, it seems like it'll protect your floor. But despite laying it upside down with weights on it for 2 day, the edges are still very curled. So expect to trip on this mat often. Also the photo in the product page shows it as very clear, it's not, it's tinted blue. Also slides around on hardwood (currently have it taped down). If you care about your hardwood floor more than your nose or your stubbed toes, this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lea D

customer_reviews.title: ----UPDATE------
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting the smell in the room lately but I've thought it was my carpet! After reading the reviews, just realized it's the mat! I'm returning it right away, so disappointed! I was enjoying it a lot but definitely not for me, the smell is driving me crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Zeze Ander

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: There are no studs on the bottom of the mat to hold it in place. It is very thin plastic and with the weight of me(average male weight) in my chair, the plastic is fully pressed down into the carpet and does not allow me to smoothly move around. Feels just like when I was trying to roll on the carpet. This thing is complete garbage and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Daddy™

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Was curled tightly in the box but was still pliable so flattened it as much as I could and let it set overnight. Laid it in place the next morning and it is nice and flat. Yes, a little smell that first day. But it's gone now. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Andale

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxious smell
customer_reviews.text: This cannot be considered 'odor free' as listed in description by any stretch of the imagination. Days after removing from package, odor just as strong as when first opened!
customer_reviews.author: P Holland

customer_reviews.title: Stays flat, but has strong smell for first few days
customer_reviews.text: Rolled out and flattened out perfectly within a few hours. Only complaint is that it slides easily under chair on hardwood floors. May have to add some adhesive or something I'm not sure. Seems durable, has stayed flat for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Crage Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this chair mat! It doesn't have a funky smell like some others I purchased, and it rolled out and became flat easily. My new office chair rolls so much better on this mat than the area rug I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Christi L.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat to replace another one I had in my office. It was flat pretty quickly and I have not had any issues with curling. There was an odor when first unpacking, but nothing that wouldn’t be expected and it went away quickly once it was opened.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki W

customer_reviews.title: Stinks to high heaven
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, don’t buy this thing. My wife and I had it off gassing it’s noxious odor in the backyard for two weeks and it still reeked like chemical plastic death when we brought it into the house. We live in CA, and with the wildfire smoke on top of everything else, we did not need another air pollution source in our home. I wish I didn’t give this thing such a lengthy amount of time to work. I should’ve returned it strait away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: The price was reasonable. The mat was shipped rolled up. It was difficult to flatten out and make it lay flat. After a week or so the mat started to roll up on the edge and move on the floor. I am still having to deal with the mat moving on the floor. Over all the mat is ok.
customer_reviews.author: RGMcl

customer_reviews.title: Liked so much bought 1 for me
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect!! Bought it for my hubby’s desk. Liked it so much bought one for mine. Very little Oder and laid flat overnight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Only Adequate
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect this item would be top of the line based on the price and I wasn’t too disappointed. So buy this item if you just need an item to fill the gap for a while, because I can’t imagine it will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: GraflexTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good product but bad smell through shipping.
customer_reviews.text: These mats seem to work well. My only gripe was about the shipping. They stunk when I opened them. They smelled like skunks. It was so bad until I put them in hot water w/ soap, wash detergent and pine soil just to see if that would help get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small desks
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few months now and it’s perfect. The lip part is narrow so it actually fits under my 30 inch desk. I tried several mats before finding this gem. No smell issues and it flattened out pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sneeze Girl

customer_reviews.title: its ok but slides on the floors to much
customer_reviews.text: i work at home so is a decent product that avoids me scratching up my hardwood floors. The problem is that it does not hold well to hardwood floors and I constantly have to adjust it every day. at least it does not bend at the edges like others I have used nor rip from constant rolling over it.
customer_reviews.author: Luar

customer_reviews.title: i hate it
customer_reviews.text: i have had it 3 weeks. Still cant roll my chair on it. They shipped it like a cigar and the ripples wont go away. I put it outside in the sun all day . did not help. This last week I put under my desk and the ripples still are huge and I cant roll my chair on it. I hate it. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PENNY

customer_reviews.title: Easy comfort sliding chair!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this floor mat for hardwood floor easy to maneuver without sliding and exerting more effort. I am recommending this to someone who has a mobility problem like me.
customer_reviews.author: thelma moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardwood flooring
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. We purchased two of these mats to use on hardwood flooring. No smell and stays in place well. Arrived rolled, but we just laid them out on the floor for a day and it flattened.
customer_reviews.author: Traci M.

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for less movement
customer_reviews.text: They move a lot. If i move to far off the mat when I try to reposition the mat will hook on the wheel and move. I know it is on tile but was hoping they would be a little more stationary and they are little thinner than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. There was no smell and it unrolled well straight away but we followed instructions and put it in the sunshine for a couple of hours and it was perfect. We did not put it right up to wall, so the desk legs sat on edge of mat which prevents movement and it was a little further back which suited us well. I like the fact that the flooring is visible through the mat. Exactly as stated in advert and good value too - perfect for protecting the flooring.
customer_reviews.author: sunshinegirl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: Good size and thick. Unfortunately it doesn’t stay in place because there aren’t any spikes on the under side to keep it from sliding on the carpet. It was constantly moving every time I tried to roll the chair.
customer_reviews.author: CMCollins3

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable Smell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mat back in November. I made sure to air it out multiple times as it emits a strong odor out of the box. We’ve had a smell in our office the last month and couldn’t figure out what it was until the other day. After we removed this mat from the Office the smell went away instantly. It’s in our Garage now ready to be thrown out and is emitting a terrible smell there. I wish we had figured this out sooner as the return window passed a few weeks ago and now we’re out our money on a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: While the quality is good, this is a full foot narrower than my previous floor protector. Functions as adverrtised but I wish it was wider. Now, my armchair rolls past the protector all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: This plastic product smells terrible! So strong, I had to leave it outside for 2 days to try to air it out and then when I finally brought it inside I realized it is so thin and flimsy. It gets huge dents where the chair wheels are, making the chair near impossible to roll around. I weigh less than 140lbs and am not a large person. Will be returning immediately
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Mat looks nice, comes rolled in a tube and is easy to install. The only problem is that it smells absolutely terrible! I'm hoping the smell diminishes with time, but right now I'm keeping the windows open.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Smedley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This product required several days to lay completely flat after being unrolled from its packaging. Once it was flat on the floor, it stays in place well on hardwood and seems to be holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Kyle F

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this chair mat! I love that it’s see through so that I can see the ceramic tiles under it, I love the thickness so it doesn’t move as I do and the size is perfect! The seller did a wonderful job with packaging it so that it didn’t get damaged and it arrived on time ... I would highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Namita Tiwari

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell off gassing 7 days
customer_reviews.text: This product has been off-gassing for days, including two days outdoors. I'm not sure what chemicals it's made of , however I feel it's very unnecessary. I ordered two chair mats one for hardwood which is this one and one for carpet from another company. The carpet mat did not smell at all when I received it I was able to install without a problem. If this does not manage itself within the next day or two I'm considering sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Quite a moving experience!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the mat for less than a week as of now. The quality of the mat seems decent. It's thick and clear and the chair rolls very well on it. It is meant for hard floors, but the mat rotates a full 90 degrees by the end of every day...I have to buy some slip gripping items to hopefully keep the mat in one place. Only downside so far is the constant moving of the mat. (It is installed as per the instructions to be smooth side down.)
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for a home office desk. Makes moving around easy and protects floor
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I needed this since I have wooden floors but its GREAT. Definitely helps protect the floors and helps me move around in my chair easily. Great size
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Quimpo

customer_reviews.title: Great hardwood protector for my office chair
customer_reviews.text: The AiBOB Office Chair mat for Hardwood Floor, 36 x 48 inches is great for protecting the hardwood floors in my office. My chair can easily guide on the protector and lies flat without curing and moving.
customer_reviews.author: nubxl

customer_reviews.title: Great product except the smell
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box it STINKS. I let it air out and flatten out in my driveway under the hot sun for 3hrs. By the time I brought it in the smell was gone. Hence the 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: YoungTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT an odorless mat.
customer_reviews.text: The first feature of this listing reads: “The floor mat is Odorless, no BPA, does not contain volatile odor for a healthy indoor environment.” False. This thing stinks! Granted, I just unpacked it this morning, so maybe it takes a couple of days. But wow that claim of odorless just isn’t remotely close to true. Otherwise, this is a decent mat. I haven’t had it slide, and my chair gets along with it well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Montville

customer_reviews.title: Good good product
customer_reviews.text: good product useful. I am interested in seeing this product and want to have it. I like products that are similar to my neighbor's products. then I search for and buy products that are similar to my neighbors. When I got home and I saw I was satisfied that the product I ordered did not disappoint me. I like it and it's better than my neighbor's product. I am happy to have a product that is better than my neighbor's. I like to wear it. seller's recommendation, a good product
customer_reviews.author: joanne yost

customer_reviews.title: Protect your hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I noticed the hardwood floor area in front of my home office desk was starting to look worn. The AiBOB mat was the perfect size covering the floor under my chair. I spend a considerable number of hours at my desk during the day and the mat has not cracked, curled or in anyway made it difficult for me to move in and out from my desk. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary OConnor

customer_reviews.title: great mat
customer_reviews.text: I just had hardwood floors installed we both have computer desk and chair we roll around we didn't want to mess up my new floor. It has worked out just fine and we didn't have any trouble getting it to lay flat. Plus if we happen to spill something it's easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: My chair mat was all cracked and broken, so I got this one. I like the size. Fits under my desk nice. It is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Taxlady

customer_reviews.title: Good for heavy chairs
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'5"/280lbs. We put this under his heavy and large office chair. The chair rolls easily on it. It laid out easily. I did not notice any weird smell that some mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but smelly
customer_reviews.text: The mat itself is great. Unrolled flat just fine and seems durable. I’ve yet to see any scratches in the first week of use. The reason I gave three versus five stars is the fact that it does have a strong plastic odor. This is something that goes against the product description and a reason for my purchase. I’m choosing to live with it and the headaches because I don’t want to ruin my wood floor and it’s too cold to open the windows to air out the odor.
customer_reviews.author: StBaumy

customer_reviews.title: It can’t even do the basic thing which is stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend it. It curls (the very thing they say it doesn’t do in the title) because it doesn’t stay in place it moves back and forth with the chair. The two stars it’s because the package was nice and it arrived on time. That’s where the positives end.
customer_reviews.author: 10sGerar

customer_reviews.title: Rolled up
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for over a month and cannot get it to lay flat! We have rolled it the opposite way and have had the chair on it for quite some time. Please don’t roll these so tight in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Slides on your floor.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I put it down on my floor but it slides! We are always moving it back into place. I’m now looking for a way to adhere it to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: aimeemaries

customer_reviews.title: It smells bad.
customer_reviews.text: This works as a floor mat. It does get discolored from the weight of whatever is on it (in my case, a chair). The reason I rated it so poorly is that it STINKS. I have had this for a full month and it still is overwhelming. It makes the air heavy. I've had an air filter running, I've left it out on a cold porch for a few days, nothing helps. I will probably try to seek a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: I'd give a zero if I could
customer_reviews.text: The product rolls on the edges, does not stay in place and the wheels leave indentations. It's large and paying for packaging to return is not worth it. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: shari

customer_reviews.title: Great mat at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is non-slip for sure. Having hardwood floors, my chair would roll extremely easy - too easy. This mat slows it down slightly so it's ideal to to maneuver the chair. No one likes a runaway chair! The mat took minutes to lay flat after unrolling - without using anything to weigh it down. One thing is the description says odor free. There was a slight rotten egg smell initially, but dissipated in a day, so that was not enough to drop a star. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W Haley

customer_reviews.title: Smells BAD!
customer_reviews.text: It smells like chemicals so I put it outside and washed it. After any month outside it still overwhelmed my whole home with the smell of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Smell causes severe headaches
customer_reviews.text: Three days in and still smells causing major headaches . Putting this outside tonight hoping it will air out, if not it is going in the garbage. Do not advertise this as no smell, that is false! The mat itself is fine, other that the incessant odor!
customer_reviews.author: seesay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my office with hardwood floors. Works great. No issues with rolling up or anything. Lies nice and flat and protects my floors.
customer_reviews.author: DeeL42

customer_reviews.title: Total Garbage
customer_reviews.text: For the first two weeks it smelled something foul, and then it started to curt up on the sides making using it more than annoying. My chair wheels got caught in it all the time. Finally I removed it and put it out for disposal. I'd return it but because usually what I buy on line is good, I threw away the carton it came in. Hardly worth the effort to find another box. Forewarned is forearmed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Kunikoff

customer_reviews.title: Not Suitable for use on Carpet
customer_reviews.text: Read the product description carefully. While this product is probably adequate for Hardwood Floor, as described, it will NOT work on even low profile wall-to-wall carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart S Meighan

customer_reviews.title: Worthless on vinyl
customer_reviews.text: I have vinyl floors and this mat is worthless for this flooring despite them saying it works on vinyl. The mat slides on the vinyl like it's on ice. Sitting in the chair it's fine and doesn't move, but getting in or out of the chair is an adventure when it slides out from under you!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: don't slip and fall!
customer_reviews.text: The product indeed does flatten out well. However, it is stated that it is specifically for hardwood floors. There is ZERO grip and if you step on it, you will slip and fall. Ask me how I know....
customer_reviews.author: April Webb

customer_reviews.title: Mat
customer_reviews.text: The mat works great. However, when you first open up the box and lay the mat out on the floor, it has a strong smell of plastic that lasts for a day or so. Let it air out. Otherwise a good product and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shot249

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after we finished putting in new luxury vinyl plank to protect the area around our computer desk. It promised to lay completely flat and stay put. After a month it still doesn't lay flat. It constantly moves which is really frustrating. I'd return it but have missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Z

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: it looks good in the room !!! it is made of a resistant material, it is completely flat, arrives super fast and the size fits perfectly to the chair and the space.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: rolled out flat
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price. I wish I had ordered the bigger size but this has worked out great. It is great quality and durable. It rolled out flat which was my biggest concern. I am happy with my purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: made well
customer_reviews.text: it flatten out first time putting on my floor no problems... update Ive had this on my floor a month now I had no problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Dancor

customer_reviews.title: Sad sad sad little piece of plastic
customer_reviews.text: IF you would like to pay $32 for piece of Ziploc the go-ahead, but overall this thing is disappointing. In terms of everything.
customer_reviews.author: LoneWandererx101

product_meta.title: AiBOB Office Chair mat for Hardwood Floor, 36 x 48 inches, Easy Glide for Chairs, Flat Without Curling, Floor Mats for Computer Desk
product_meta.description:
AiBOB Office Chair Mat: Our office floor mat is good for hardwood floors, tile, laminate, vinyl, concrete, and linoleum. It is ergonomically designed to allow effortless movement of office chair wheels, and provide good protection to your hard floor.

Features:

1. The floor mat is Odorless, no BPA, does not contain volatile odor for a healthy indoor environment.

2. The unique surface texture allows your office chair casters to move easily while carrying out daily tasks, but has enough grip to maintain controlled rolling so the chair doesn't skid around.

3. Our office Chair Mat made from long-life pure polyethylene that protects your floors and prevents everyday wear and tear caused by office chair casters (wheels) and other markings.

4. the mat’s surface is strong and sturdy, so your chair’s wheels will easily glide across the mat, without scratching, sinking, or leaving indentations.

5. The mat is also flexible and can be laid flat without curling.

Attentions:

1. Keep away from fire or extreme heat.

2. For the purpose of saving packing space, our office Chair mats may be rolled when packaged. Rolling back, and the chair mat will be gradually flat over several hours.

3. Try placing it in a warm room or near a sunny window for best and quickest results.

4. When you open the package, you will find that the office chair mat has two different sides: One is smooth and the other side is matte. Please let the chair mat flat on your floor and put the matte face up.

Specifications:

1. Material: polyethylene

2. Dimensions: (47 x 35 x 1/16)" (120 x 90 x 0.15) cm (L x W x H)

3. Weight: 4 pounds

4. Color: clear

Package Includes:

1 x Office Desk Chair Mat

1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR HARD FLOORS: Protect your flooring from scratches and dust of any kind with this perfect office floor mat for hardwood floors, tile, laminate, vinyl, concrete, and linoleum. The office chair mat is designed for Hard Floors only.

SAFE FOR YOUR HOME: The chair mat is Odorless, no BPA; phthalate and does not contain volatile odor for a healthy indoor environment. It is 100% pure polyethylene chair mat. Rest assured you are buying a safe option for your home or office.

EFFORTLESS ROLL STABLE GRIP: The unique surface texture allows your office chair casters to move easily while carrying out daily tasks, but has enough grip to maintain controlled rolling so the chair doesn't skid around. Ease of rolling between tasks promotes ergonomic posture and helps to considerably reduce the risk of physical fatigue.

SURFACE DURABILITY & FLEXIBILITY: The mat’s surface is super tough, so our office chair mat won’t be crack or shatter while protecting your office floor from damaging chair casters. Because of the mat’s strong, sturdy and solid surface, your chair’s wheels will easily glide across the mat, without scratching, sinking, or leaving indentations. The desk chair mat is also flexible and can be laid flat without curling.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Each chair mat you purchase comes with a 100% 60 DAYS RETURN SERVICE. If you are not happy with your chair mat, contact us directly (even if outside the Amazon return window). We only aim to provide the best products and customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,295 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
